sentences.en: He allowed a fine patina of old coffee to develop around the inside of the mug.
sentences.cn: 他任由大杯内壁积聚上一层薄薄的咖啡垢。

sentences.en: He looked relaxed and elegant and had the patina of success.
sentences.cn: 他神态轻松潇洒，给人成功的印象。

sentences.en: I like this state. It'should be like this. The blade should not have rust or patina.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这样的状态. 本来就应如此. 刃地本不应有锈和包浆的.

sentences.en: Many industrial processes a patina that is integral to the integrity and interest of the site.
sentences.cn: 许多工业流程能够为遗址的完整性和趣味性增色.

sentences.en: Some cooks love the natural mellow patina that develops when copper is exposed to and air.
sentences.cn: 当铜锅暴露在热和空气中,有些烹饪可能会产生铜绿.

sentences.en: The trophy has a beautiful green patina.
sentences.cn: 这个奖杯表面有一层漂亮的绿锈。

sentences.en: The trophy is very impressive and rather special because it has a beautiful green patina.
sentences.cn: 这个奖杯给人印象非常深刻，相当特别，因为它表面有一层漂亮的绿锈。

sentences.en: We directly provide you with the finished copper ( ancient copper ) plate and patina ( green copper ) plate .
sentences.cn: 我们直接向你提供做好的古 铜板 、绿 铜板.

trans.tran_cn: （青铜器上的）铜绿，绿锈，（旧木器等表面）年久而产生的光泽，神情
trans.tran_en: a greenish layer that forms naturally on the surface of  copper  or  bronze
